title: Winter storms disrupt travel across Europe
summary: Heavy snow and icy conditions disrupted air and rail travel across parts of Europe.

title: OPEC+ agrees to extend oil production cuts
summary: OPEC+ members agreed to extend oil production cuts to stabilize global energy markets.

title: UN reports 2024 among hottest years on record
summary: UN climate agencies reported that 2024 ranked among the hottest years ever recorded.

title: EU leaders agree on new migration framework
summary: European Union leaders reached agreement on a new framework to manage migration flows.

title: Global central banks signal cautious outlook for 2025
summary: Major central banks signaled caution on interest rate policy amid uncertain economic conditions.

title: SpaceX launches next-generation Starship test
summary: SpaceX conducted another test flight of its Starship rocket as part of its Mars ambitions.

title: Holiday travel peaks worldwide
summary: Airports and transport hubs saw heavy congestion as holiday travel reached peak levels.

title: Pope delivers Christmas message calling for peace
summary: Pope Francis used his Christmas message to call for peace in conflict zones worldwide.

title: Markets close year on strong note
summary: Global stock markets ended 2024 on a positive note amid easing inflation concerns.

title: World reflects on turbulent 2024
summary: Leaders and analysts reflected on a year marked by elections, conflicts, and economic uncertainty.
